note.text: In this section, you learned to:

- Define culture.
- List the four foundational competencies of culture study.
- Identify the differences between culture-general and culture-specific.
- Identify the differences between high-context and low-context communication.
- Identify the differences between individualism and collectivism.
- Identify the differences between monochronic and polychronic time orientations.
If you feel comfortable with your knowledge of this material, begin the quiz on the next page. if not, review the section further
